data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Bayelsa.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bayelsa, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 514,810 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Bayelsa.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Bayelsa that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Bayelsa that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Ukwa people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Ukwa people.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Bayelsa with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 514,810 believers in Bayelsa, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bayelsa, Nigeria has a population of 1,998,300.

We estimate Bayelsa has 514,810 people who might know Jesus, 508,515 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 974,975 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 514,810 believers in the state of Bayelsa the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

location.name: Bayelsa
location.people_groups_list: Karekare, Kanuri, Yerwa, Koro Nulu, Jimbin, Ahan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Karekare (381,000), Kanuri, Yerwa (7,186,000), Koro Nulu (4,000), Jimbin (4,100), Ahan (500)
